content.raw_text: From: Disney+ Hotstar <no-reply@hotstar.com> To: rajat.verma86@gmail.com Subject: ✅ Welcome to Disney+ Hotstar Mobile! Your subscription is now active Date: Sat, 21 Jun 2025 10:45:12 +0530 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset="UTF-8" ... Hello Rajat, Thanks for choosing Disney+ Hotstar Mobile (Monthly). Your subscription is active from 21 Jun 2025 and will renew automatically every month at ₹149 (incl. taxes). Payment summary Plan: Mobile Amount charged ₹149.00 Payment method UPI ••••4482 (rajat@ybl) GSTIN 27AAACN1234E1Z3 You can start streaming on one mobile device right away. Need more screens or 4K? Upgrade here. Happy streaming! — Team Disney+ Hotstar

From: Disney+ Hotstar Trials <trials@hotstar.com> To: sneha_kapoor29@outlook.com Subject: 🎬 Your 7-day Disney+ Hotstar trial is live – start watching now! Date: Mon, 17 Jun 2025 08:14:05 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Hi Sneha, Welcome to Disney+ Hotstar! Your 7-day Mobile free trial started today and ends on 24 Jun 2025. After that, you’ll be charged ₹149/month via UPI (sneha@ibl). Cancel anytime in Settings > Subscription. Start streaming: https://www.hotstar.com/in/start Happy binge-watching! Team Disney+ Hotstar

From: Disney+ Hotstar <reminder@hotstar.com> To: sneha_kapoor29@outlook.com Subject: ⏰ Your free trial ends tomorrow – keep the magic alive Date: Sun, 23 Jun 2025 07:02:44 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Hi Sneha, Your Disney+ Hotstar Mobile trial ends in 24 hours (24 Jun 2025). Do nothing and we’ll automatically charge ₹149 via UPI (sneha@ibl) for the next month. Want to cancel? Visit Settings before 11:59 PM IST tomorrow. Thanks for streaming with us!

From: Disney+ Hotstar Billing <billing@hotstar.com> To: rajat.verma86@gmail.com Subject: Payment received – Enjoy Disney+ Hotstar Super in FHD Date: Wed, 26 Jun 2025 12:31:09 +0530 Content-Type: text/html Hi Rajat, We’ve successfully processed ₹499 on your Visa •••• 8765 for your upgrade to the Super Annual plan. Your new renewal date is 26 Jun 2026. Invoice #: HSR-INV-93018842 Download PDF: click here Enjoy FHD on two devices! © 2025 Disney+ Hotstar | Unsubscribe

From: Disney+ Hotstar Billing <billing@hotstar.com> To: anirudh.bose88@yahoo.com Subject: ⚠️ We couldn’t renew your Disney+ Hotstar Super plan Date: Mon, 30 Jun 2025 04:15:22 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Dear Anirudh, Your auto-renewal attempted on 30 Jun 2025 for ₹499 (Super Annual) was declined by HDFC Bank (card ending 1123). Your access will pause on 03 Jul 2025 if we can’t process payment. Update card → https://www.hotstar.com/in/payments Need help? Call 1800-212-0000. Disney+ Hotstar Support

From: Disney+ Hotstar <no-reply@hotstar.com> To: shalini.mehra01@gmail.com Subject: Your Disney+ Hotstar Premium plan has been renewed Date: Fri, 11 Apr 2025 02:07:10 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Hi Shalini, We charged ₹1,499 to Amex •••• 9900 on 11 Apr 2025 and renewed your Premium Annual plan through 11 Apr 2026. Watch in 4K on up to 4 devices at once. Invoice: https://www.hotstar.com/in/invoice/PRM-APR-2025-9900 Manage subscription: https://www.hotstar.com/in/account

From: Disney+ Hotstar <cancellations@hotstar.com> To: vivek.thakur14@gmail.com Subject: We’re sorry to see you go Date: Wed, 28 May 2025 17:58:41 +0530 Content-Type: text/html Hi Vivek, Your Disney+ Hotstar Super membership was canceled effective 28 May 2025. You can keep streaming until 27 Jun 2025 (end of paid period). No further charges will apply. Changed your mind? Restart membership anytime. © 2025 Disney+ Hotstar

From: Disney+ Hotstar <upgrade@hotstar.com> To: rajat.verma86@gmail.com Subject: 🎉 Upgrade successful – Super unlocked! Date: Thu, 26 Jun 2025 12:30:17 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Congrats, Rajat! Your account is now on Super (Annual). ₹350 was charged (pro-rated) to Visa •••• 8765. Enjoy FHD and Dolby 5.1 on 2 devices. Need help? https://help.hotstar.com

From: Disney+ Hotstar <update@hotstar.com> To: shalini.mehra01@gmail.com Subject: Your plan has been downgraded to Super Date: Mon, 05 May 2025 11:12:01 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Hi Shalini, You’ve switched to Super Monthly (₹299). Your Premium benefits will remain until 11 Apr 2026, after which Super pricing applies. Questions? Reply to this e-mail.

From: Disney+ Hotstar Deals <offers@hotstar.com> To: anirudh.bose88@yahoo.com Subject: Last 48 hrs: Upgrade to Premium at 50% off! Date: Tue, 09 Jul 2025 09:00:13 +0530 Content-Type: text/html Upgrade now and pay just ₹749 (worth ₹1,499) for a full year of Disney+ Hotstar Premium. Claim offer → Offer valid until 11 Jul 2025 23:59 IST. T&C apply.

From: Disney+ Hotstar Billing <refunds@hotstar.com> To: armaan.rastogi22@icloud.com Subject: Refund processed – ₹299 has been credited Date: Thu, 20 Mar 2025 16:22:29 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Hello Armaan, We’ve issued a refund of ₹299 to your SBI card •••• 4420 for the duplicate charge on 19 Mar 2025. Funds may take 5-7 business days to appear. Reference: RFND-HS-1920-299

From: Disney+ Hotstar Billing <billing@hotstar.com> To: rajat.verma86@gmail.com Subject: Your monthly Disney+ Hotstar invoice – June 2025 Date: Sat, 21 Jun 2025 10:45:14 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Invoice #: HSR-M-0625-4482 Billed to: Rajat Verma (GSTIN 27AABCV1234R1Z5) Plan: Mobile Monthly – ₹149 Download PDF: https://www.hotstar.com/in/invoice/HSR-M-0625-4482

From: Disney+ Hotstar <share@hotstar.com> To: rajat.verma86@gmail.com Subject: 📺 Add family members to your Super plan Date: Sun, 29 Jun 2025 13:04:55 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Hi Rajat, Your Super plan lets you stream on two devices. Send the invite link below to share access with family: Invite link (expires in 72 hrs): https://www.hotstar.com/in/family/ab12cd34 Need more screens and 4K? Upgrade to Premium.

From: Disney+ Hotstar Statements <statements@hotstar.com> To: shalini.mehra01@gmail.com Subject: Your Disney+ Hotstar statement – May 2025 Date: Sat, 01 Jun 2025 08:02:21 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain May 2025 usage summary —————————————— Plan Premium Annual Devices used 4 Top genre K-Drama Hours streamed 104 h No payment due (annual plan prepaid). Full PDF → https://www.hotstar.com/in/statement/0525

From: Disney+ Hotstar Deals <offers@hotstar.com> To: armaan.rastogi22@icloud.com Subject: ⏳ Your 50% Premium upgrade coupon expires tonight Date: Fri, 11 Jul 2025 07:00:05 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Hi Armaan, Just a heads-up that your coupon PREM50 expires at 23:59 IST today (11 Jul 2025). Redeem → https://www.hotstar.com/in/upgrade/promo?code=PREM50

From: Disney+ Hotstar Billing <billing@hotstar.com> To: sneha_kapoor29@outlook.com Subject: Payment received – Your Mobile plan continues Date: Tue, 24 Jun 2025 08:14:03 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain ₹149 was charged to UPI (sneha@ibl). Next renewal on 24 Jul 2025.

From: Disney+ Hotstar <no-reply@hotstar.com> To: prakash.doshi17@rediffmail.com Subject: Disney+ Hotstar Premium renewed for another year Date: Thu, 15 May 2025 02:36:18 +0530 Content-Type: text/plain Hi Prakash, We charged ₹1,499 on 15 May 2025 to Visa •••• 6611 and extended your Premium Annual plan through 15 May 2026. Invoice: https://www.hotstar.com/in/invoice/PRM-0525-6611
